/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The roads are teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings that line the roads are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and brown, reflecting the urban landscape.
